text: aur jab un par koyi azaab waaqe hota, to yo kehte ke aye Mosa! hamaare liye apne rab se us baath ki dua kar di jiye jis ka us ne aap se ahad kar rakha hai, agar aap is azaab se hum ko hata de to hum zaroor zaroor aap ke kehne se imaan le ayenge aur hum bani israel ko bhi (reha kar ke) aap ke hamraah kar denge
